summary.span: 使用 來建立 屬性值的動畫，以產生動畫值。

span.span: Animates the value of a property by using a to generate the animated values.

summary.span: 這個動畫可用來使視覺物件沿著路徑移動。

span.span: This animation can be used to move a visual object along a path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓您建立角度和與單一的動畫物件位置的動畫和。 enables you to animate the angle and position of an object with a single animation and . A繪製其目標所使用線性插補在指定。A animates its target by using linear interpolation over the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Media.Matrix GetCurrentValueCore(valuetype System.Windows.Media.Matrix defaultOriginValue, valuetype System.Windows.Media.Matrix defaultDestinationValue, class System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock) cil managed

protected: override System::Windows::Media::Matrix GetCurrentValueCore(System::Windows::Media::Matrix defaultOriginValue, System::Windows::Media::Matrix defaultDestinationValue, System::Windows::Media::Animation::AnimationClock ^ animationClock);

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 建議的原始值，如果沒有明確設定動畫本身的起始值，便會使用這個值。

span.span: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 建議的目的值，如果沒有明確設定動畫本身的結束值，便會使用這個值。

span.span: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.
An that generates the or used by the animation.

summary.span: 計算值，這個值表示正在建立動畫之屬性的目前值，由 決定。

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the .

returns.span: 屬性的計算值，由目前的動畫所決定。

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一個組合鏈結中，這個值會是快照集 （如果有的話） 或基底屬性的值，否則這個值會以鏈結中前一個動畫所傳回的值不是 。If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an that is not . `defaultDestinationValue`是基底值，如果動畫會在動畫的屬性上的第一個組合圖層中; 否則值是從上一個組合層次屬性的動畫的輸出值。The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsAdditive { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsAdditive : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否應該將目標屬性的目前值加入這個動畫的起始值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the target property's current value should be added to this animation's starting value.

value.span: 如果目標屬性的目前值應加入至這個動畫的起始值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the target property's current value should be added to this animation's starting value; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| > [!NOTE] > 這個相依性屬性並不常見，因為它的識別項欄位來自共用的各種衍生類別。This dependency property is unusual because the identifier field for it comes from and is shared by various derived classes. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類似的兩個動畫以動畫方式顯示相同的矩形。The following example uses two similar animations to animate the same rectangle. 第一次的動畫屬性設定為`false`，讓它永遠繪製的矩形 (0，0)，動畫的起始值。The first animation's property is set to `false`, so it always animates the rectangle from (0,0), the animation's starting value. 第二個動畫有相同的目標值 (其設定都相同)，但其屬性設定為`true`; 如此一來，它繪製的矩形，從在動畫已套用時的任何位置。The second animation has the same target values (their settings are identical), but its property is set to `true`; as a result, it animates the rectangle from whatever position it is at when the animation is applied. [!code-xaml[PathAnimationGallery_snippet#MatrixAnimationUsingPathIsAdditiveExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PathAnimationGallery_snippet/CS/matrixanimationusingpathisadditiveexample.xaml#matrixanimationusingpathisadditiveexamplewholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsAngleCumulative { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsAngleCumulative : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定動畫矩陣的旋轉角度是否應該在重複時累加。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the rotation angle of the animated matrix should accumulate over repetitions.

value.span: 如果會在動畫重複時往上累加，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the animation's rotation angle should accumulate over repetitions; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，在動畫重複時，將會累積動畫矩陣的旋轉角度。If this property is set to `true`, the rotation angle of the animated matrix will accumulate as the animation repeats. 如果路徑是小型弧線，累加的角度會導致每次重複，而不要重新啟動旋轉連續旋轉物件。If your path is a small arc, a cumulative angle will cause your object to continuously rotate with each repeat instead of restarting the rotation. 當結合的`true`，滾筒式時它退 （取決於您指定的路徑） 可能會顯示您的物件。When combined with an of `true`, your object might appear to tumble while it bounces (depending on the path you specify). 如需相關資訊，請參閱。For related information, see . 如果設定此屬性沒有任何作用是`false`。Setting this property has no effect if is `false`. 此屬性會決定是否要在動畫重複因為時累加動畫矩陣的角度其設定; 它不會導致重新啟動動畫時累積的位移。This property determines whether the animation matrix's angle accumulates when the animation repeats because of its setting; it does not cause the offset to accumulate when the animation is restarted. 如需如何進行建置關前一個動畫的動畫資訊，請參閱。For information on how to make an animation build off a previous animation's values, see . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會使用類似的兩個動畫以動畫方式顯示相同的矩形。The following example uses two similar animations to animate the same rectangle. 有相同的兩個動畫設定，這會導致要旋轉它沿著螢幕移到右邊，而這兩個動畫會設定為重複四次的矩形。Both animations have the same setting, which causes the rectangle to rotate as it moves along the screen to the right, and both animations are set to repeat four times. 第一次的動畫屬性設定為`false`，因此動畫重複時，矩形跳回其原始的角度。The first animation's property is set to `false`, so the rectangle jumps back to its original angle when the animation repeats. 第二個動畫屬性設定為`true`; 因此，矩形角度似乎在動畫重複，而不是跳回其原始值時，請增加。The second animation's property is set to `true`; as a result, the rectangle angle appears to increase when the animation repeats, rather than jumping back to its original value. [!code-xaml[PathAnimationGallery_snippet#MatrixAnimationUsingPathIsAngleCumulativeExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PathAnimationGallery_snippet/CS/matrixanimationusingpathisanglecumulativeexample.xaml#matrixanimationusingpathisanglecumulativeexamplewholepage)]

Public Shared ReadOnly IsAngleCumulativeProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsOffsetCumulative { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsOffsetCumulative : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否會隨著重複而累積由動畫矩陣所產生的位移。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the offset produced by the animated matrix will accumulate over repetitions.

value.span: 如果物件在動畫重複時往上累加，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the object will accumulate over repeats of the animation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，在動畫重複時，將會累積動畫矩陣的位移。If this property is set to `true`, the offset of the animated matrix will accumulate as the animation repeats. 例如，如果路徑是小型弧線，動畫會設定為重複累計位移會造成要出現在螢幕上來回傳送的物件。For example, if the path is a small arc and the animation is set to repeat, a cumulative offset will cause the object to appear to bounce across the screen. 此屬性會決定是否要在動畫重複因為時累加動畫矩陣的位移其設定; 它不會導致重新啟動動畫時累積的位移。This property determines whether the animation matrix's offset accumulates when the animation repeats because of its setting; it does not cause the offset to accumulate when the animation is restarted. 如需如何進行建置關前一個動畫的動畫資訊，請參閱。For information on how to make an animation build off a previous animation's values, see . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

Public Shared ReadOnly IsOffsetCumulativeProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 取得或設定用來產生這個動畫之輸出值的幾何。

span.span: Gets or sets the geometry used to generate this animation's output values.

value.span: 用來產生這個動畫之輸出值的幾何。

span.span: The geometry used to generate this animation's output values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以描述包含曲線的複雜圖形及弧線，讓您指定用於輸入動畫的複雜圖形。A can describe complex shapes that contain curves and arcs, enabling you specify complex shapes for your animation input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[幾何概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/geometry-overview.md)。For more information, see [Geometry Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/geometry-overview.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|
